explanation: [0-0] On the beach stands a woman in yellow underwear, holding a mobile phone to her mouth with her right hand. Beside her is a person in a white short-sleeved shirt, with another person sitting on the left side. To the right, a woman in a floral dress is bending over, supporting herself with both hands on the sand. Many people can be seen on the beach in the distance, and there are many houses of different colors surrounding the beach.

[0-5] As the camera moves, the woman in the floral dress stands up, flicks her hair back with her left hand, and dusts sand off the back of her thighs with both hands. Two people are playing ball in the distance on the beach.
